title: Mage Dark Skin Tone
description: A wizard or mage with a dark skin tone, often depicted with a pointed hat and a robe. It represents magic, fantasy, wisdom, and mystical powers.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the mage with dark skin tone appears as a wise and powerful figure, cloaked in deep, rich hues with subtle, realistic lighting that suggests a mystical aura. The emoji features Apple's signature soft rounded edges, giving the character a grounded yet ethereal presence. This depiction of magic and wisdom is perfect for conveying a sense of wonder, knowledge, or conjuring something extraordinary.
